description: This file defines the ItemDetailScreen widget in a Flutter app, which displays detailed information about a menu item, including image, name, rating, category, description, price, and an 'Add to cart' button.

classes.name: ItemDetailScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays detailed information about a menu item, including image, name, rating, description, price, and an option to add the item to the cart.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree that displays the item details; fetches item by ID, handles item-not-found case, and constructs UI with image, info, and add-to-cart button.
